mapper.sql: SELECT patch_id, p.project_id, pj.project_name, p.product_id, pd.product_name, jira_no, topic, patch_file_name, patch_file_url, sql_flag, patch_status, bug_flag, task_list, code_list, bugfix_flag, bugfix_patch, build_time, real_code_list, p.create_by, p.create_time, p.update_by, p.update_by_uid, p.update_time, p.del_flag, p.remark, p.merge_package_flag, p.config_flag, p.config_list, p.patch_type, p.commit_id, p.public_by, p.lock_id, p.bug_count, p.third_part_view, p.expedited, p.branch_id, p.demand_no, p.demand_name, p.task_type, p.merge_time FROM up_patch p INNER JOIN up_project pj ON p.project_id = pj.project_id and pj.del_flag = 'N' INNER JOIN up_product pd ON p.product_id = pd.product_id and pd.del_flag = 'N'
mapper.select: where patch_id = #{patchId} and p.del_flag != 'Y'
mapper.insert:
insert into up_patch
product_id, project_id, jira_no, topic, patch_file_name, patch_file_url, sql_flag, patch_status, task_list, code_list, real_code_list, bug_flag, bugfix_flag, bugfix_patch, build_time, create_time, create_by, update_by, update_by_uid, update_time, del_flag, remark, merge_package_flag, config_flag, config_list, patch_type, commit_id, public_by, lock_id, bug_count, third_part_view, branch_id, expedited, demand_no, demand_name, task_type, merge_time
#{productId}, #{projectId}, #{jiraNo}, #{topic}, #{patchFileName}, #{patchFileUrl}, #{sqlFlag}, #{patchStatus}, #{taskList}, #{codeList}, #{realCodeList}, #{bugFlag}, #{bugfixFlag}, #{bugfixPatch}, #{buildTime}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{updateByUserId}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag}, #{remark}, #{mergePackageFlag}, #{configFlag}, #{configList}, #{patchType}, #{commitId}, #{publicBy}, #{lockId}, #{bugCount}, #{thirdPartView}, #{branchId}, #{expedited}, #{demandNo}, #{demandName}, #{taskType}, #{mergeTime},
mapper.delete: update up_patch set del_flag = 'Y', update_time=sysdate() where patch_id = #{patchId}

update up_patch set del_flag = 'Y', update_time=sysdate() where patch_id in
#{patchId}

update up_patch set del_flag = 'Y', update_time=sysdate(), update_by = #{loginName} where patch_id in
#{patchId}
mapper.select: SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
where merge_package_flag = #{parentPatchId} and p.del_flag != 'Y' order by build_time desc

SELECT patch_id FROM up_patch WHERE merge_package_flag = ( SELECT patch_id FROM up_patch WHERE patch_file_name = #{patchFileName} and del_flag != 'Y' ) OR patch_file_name = #{patchFileName} and del_flag != 'Y'
mapper.update:
update up_patch set patch_status = #{patchStatus}, update_time=sysdate() where patch_id in
#{patchId}
mapper.select:
SELECT p.update_by as name, su.login_name as id, count(p.update_by) as total FROM up_patch p INNER JOIN up_project_product upp ON upp.project_id = p.project_id and upp.product_id = p.product_id and upp.test_flag = 'N' and upp.del_flag = 'N' INNER JOIN sys_user su ON p.update_by = su.user_name and su.del_flag = '0' and su.status = '0' INNER JOIN sys_dept sd ON sd.dept_id = su.dept_id
and p.patch_status = #{upPatch.patchStatus} and p.build_time < date_format(#{upPatch.createTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and sd.parent_id = #{deptId} and p.del_flag != 'Y' and p.product_id != '7' /*LIS单独统计*/
group by p.update_by union all SELECT CONCAT (su.user_name, '(' , up.project_name, ')') AS name, su.login_name AS id, COUNT(p.update_by) AS total FROM up_patch p INNER JOIN up_project up ON p.project_id = up.project_id AND up.del_flag != 'Y' INNER JOIN up_project_product upp ON upp.project_id = p.project_id AND upp.product_id = p.product_id AND upp.test_flag = 'Y' AND upp.del_flag = 'N' INNER JOIN sys_user su ON upp.test_principal = su.user_id AND su.del_flag = '0' AND su.status = '0' INNER JOIN sys_dept sd ON sd.dept_id = su.dept_id WHERE p.patch_status = #{upPatch.patchStatus} AND p.build_time < DATE_FORMAT(#{upPatch.createTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AND sd.parent_id = #{deptId} AND p.del_flag != 'Y' AND p.product_id != '7' /*LIS单独统计*/ GROUP BY upp.test_principal UNION ALL SELECT up.product_name AS name, IF(TRUE, '11957', '11957') AS id, /*默认LIS@测试组组长*/ COUNT(p.update_by) AS total FROM up_patch p INNER JOIN up_product up ON p.product_id = up.product_id AND up.del_flag != 'Y' INNER JOIN up_project_product upp ON upp.project_id = p.project_id AND upp.product_id = p.product_id AND upp.test_flag = 'Y' AND upp.del_flag = 'N' INNER JOIN sys_user su ON upp.test_principal = su.user_id AND su.del_flag = '0' AND su.status = '0' INNER JOIN sys_dept sd ON sd.dept_id = su.dept_id WHERE p.patch_status = #{upPatch.patchStatus} AND p.build_time < DATE_FORMAT(#{upPatch.createTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AND sd.parent_id = #{deptId} AND p.del_flag != 'Y' AND p.product_id = '7' /*统计LIS*/ GROUP BY up.product_name ORDER BY total DESC

SELECT su.login_name AS id, p.jira_no as jiraNo, p.patch_file_name as name, p.merge_package_flag as merge, p.update_by as updateBy FROM up_patch p INNER JOIN up_project pj ON p.project_id = pj.project_id and pj.del_flag = 'N' INNER JOIN up_product pd ON p.product_id = pd.product_id and pd.del_flag = 'N' INNER JOIN sys_user su ON p.update_by = su.user_name and su.del_flag = '0' and su.status = '0' INNER JOIN sys_dept sd ON sd.dept_id = su.dept_id where p.del_flag != 'Y' and sd.parent_id = '101' and patch_id = #{patchId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT project_principal_id AS id, project_principal AS name FROM up_project_product WHERE project_id = #{projectId} and product_id = #{productId}

SELECT ud.product_name as productname, uj.project_name as projectname, up.patch_file_name FROM up_patch up INNER JOIN up_product ud ON ud.product_id = up.product_id INNER JOIN up_project uj ON uj.project_id = up.project_id WHERE patch_id = #{bugfixPatch}
SELECT login_name FROM sys_user WHERE user_id=#{id} and del_flag = '0' and status = '0'

and p.patch_id = (SELECT MAX(merge_package_flag) FROM up_patch WHERE patch_file_name = #{patchFileName}) and p.del_flag != 'Y'
order by p.build_time desc
